items.sentence: I imagined my first kiss would be more romantic.
There\'s absolutely no chance of that happening.
You sit here, Tom, and you sit over there, Mary.
You skipped school today and I want to know why.
You told me Tom was sick in bed. Why is he here?
You told me that you were in Boston last summer.
Tom, would you show Mary how to use the scanner?
This is the largest temple that I\'ve ever seen.
Are you telling me Tom doesn\'t do that anymore?
If we can\'t trust each other, who can we trust?
